result.arabic_text: يَوۡمَ هُم بَٰرِزُونَۖ لَا يَخۡفَىٰ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ مِنۡهُمۡ شَيۡءٞۚ لِّمَنِ ٱلۡمُلۡكُ ٱلۡيَوۡمَۖ لِلَّهِ ٱلۡوَٰحِدِ ٱلۡقَهَّارِ
result.translation: Umunsi bose bazagaragara, nta na kimwe mu byabo kizihisha Allah. (Allah azavuga ati) “Uyu munsi ubwami ni ubwa nde?” (Allah azisubiza agira ati) “Ni ubwa Allah, Umwe rukumbi, Umunyembaraga z’ikirenga.”
